start:
Welcome to the FastReads! I can help you find summaries for your favorite books. Just type in the title of the book and I'll do the rest. If you need help, type /help for more.
 Happy reading!😊
help:
Search for books using inline mode!
 also you can request summary by sending /add + book_name
for persian send /lang
no_sum: couldn't find the summary! we will add it soon!
